faqs.question: How can I find a doctor on your website?
faqs.answer: You can easily find a doctor by using our search feature. Enter the specialty, location, or the doctor's name to get a list of matching results.

faqs.question: How do I schedule an appointment with a doctor?
faqs.answer: To schedule an appointment, visit the doctor's profile, check their availability, and choose a suitable time slot. Follow the prompts to complete the appointment booking process.

faqs.question: Can I cancel or reschedule my appointment?
faqs.answer: Yes, you can cancel or reschedule your appointment through your account on our website. Please do so within the specified time frame to avoid any cancellation fees.

faqs.question: Is my personal information secure on your website?
faqs.answer: Yes, we take the privacy and security of your information seriously. Our website employs encryption and follows industry best practices to protect your data.
